commit.message:
tree.c (restore_tree_status): Do not dereference a null pointer.

        * tree.c (restore_tree_status): Do not dereference a null pointer.
Brought over from devo.  SHould fix 921215-1.c compilation failures.

From-SVN: r17225

files.patch:

+	* tree.c (restore_tree_status): Do not dereference a null pointer.
